attributes.action: Cancel the 2022 A-level and GCSE Exams due to Unfairness.
attributes.additional_details: Most students have a lack of education from teachers being off for the past few months and due to the high cases a lot of school have had to close down due to high numbers of cases or lack of staff. The students mental health should be put first, as the stress of taking an exam with a lack of time at school is unfair. it is not fair as self isolation decreased lesson time, and we have already taken regular assessments which grades can be based on.
attributes.background: The exams should be completely cancelled. Year 13s have had 5 months of education on hold due to Covid-19, and the cases are still extremely high. Most student’s have self isolated and losing valuable lesson time. Some are losing up to 30 days of lessons due to self isolating 3 different times.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/614245
